Text: Before long, the surroundings are inexplicably dark.

The inky blackness gnaws away at the sky itself.
Something vaguely resembling flower petals whirl
about its center.
From the clouds, something colossal emerges.

And when the colossal entity screams, the atmosphere
quakes, and the destruction begins.
Let the feast of slaughter begin...!

Roses bloom in the sky, a bat writhes in fire,
a band of light calms the land... Each is an
extraordinary sight.

The amputated wing wafts down like a leaf from a
tree, and Ragnarok's massive frame begins plummeting
downward. A man in a jet-black longcoat swoops out
of the darkness.

Urgent report from Oriana. The Black Rose has been
activated.
It'll probably fail halfway there, though.

As Ragnarok screams, a seemingly endless horde of
black, newborn lumps are born. They're hideous
beasts the likes of which nobody present has ever
seen.

You may have had the element of surprise,
but it's still impressive that you managed to
wound Ragnarok...
Allow me to ask, who are you?

Upon that signal, the people remaining in the church
stand up simultaneously.

Ragnarok's arm, which Shadow had just torn off,
instantly regenerates.

The moment Ragnarok screams, beasts begin to descend
toward Shadow.
And the Shadow Garden begins to move as one.
You have something to do, don't you?
